item.title: OpenAdmin WriteUp
item.description: Hey everyone, Vdgonc here. So this is my walkthrough of OpenAdmin on Hack The Box. Disclaimer: It’s my first public post in English, also my third post in all my life. Also, my idea is to show how I think when I’m solving a challenge, so there will be no flag to show. With port scanning, I detect two open ports (22 and 80), the port 80 running Apache Server then using Gobuster to enumerate folder and files on the server I found the directory /ona.
